name: Parapente
about: At Bauges Parapente, located in the heart of the French Alps' Bauges mountain range, we offer a unique and immersive paragliding experience. Our school, situated near Annecy Lake and Chamb√©ry/Aix-les-Bains, provides beginner and intermediate level courses in 4 or 5-day sessions. Our passionate instructors, with a deep love for the sport and the region, ensure customized instruction and coaching. We emphasize safety, using lightweight equipment and reversible harnesses, and offer tandem flights and hike & fly experiences. Our training sites, including alpine pastures and grassy meadows, are ideal for pilots of all levels. Join us to learn to fly in one of the most beautiful and preserved mountain ranges in the Alps, where every flight is an adventure.
